channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Record Breaking Rains Kill 20 People Across Arabian Peninsula
item.description: Record breaking rains have killed 20 people and flooded streets across the Arabian Peninsula. Dubai International Airport has cancelled hundreds of flights, leaving thousands stran

item.title: U.S. House Republicans Unveil Military Aid Bills With US$8.1B for Taiwan
item.description: U.S. House Republicans have introduced three new military aid bills, one of which would set aside 8.1 billion U.S. dollars for Taiwan and countering China in the Indo-Pacific.

item.title: Health Ministry Launches Platform To Help Taiwan's Social Workers
item.description: The health ministry says a new high-tech computer platform will help ease the burdens social workers face in their jobs.
